name: topo
description: USFS Topographic Map + Trail System Application

scripts.build_app: tsc --target es5 --strict --lib dom,esnext --outFile dist/app.js src/util.ts src/app.ts
scripts.build_parser: tsc --target es5 --strict --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --lib dom,esnext --outFile dist/trail_parser.js  src/trail_parser.ts src/util.ts
scripts.build_test: tsc --target es5 --strict --lib dom,esnext --outFile dist/test.js src/util.ts src/util.test.ts

author: Edward Wawrzynek
